summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Klickitat Avenue from West Spokane Street to Sixteenth Avenue S. W. et al in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains under Ordinance No. 23912, creating Local Improvement District No. 2311 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
